abstract.p: American Business Press is renamed American Business Media; New York Advertising and Communications Network is renamed Out Professionals; Turner Fernandez Turner is opening San Francisco office; Markle Foundation is providing $2 million to Advertising Council for campaign highlighting benefits of interactive media for children; creative work will be donated by TBWA/Chiat/Day (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: * American Business Press, New York, was renamed American Business Media. * The New York Advertising and Communications Network was renamed Out Professionals. * Turner Fernandez Turner, Atlanta, is opening a San Francisco office. * The Markle Foundation, New York, is providing $2 million to the Advertising Council, New York, for a campaign highlighting the benefits of interactive media for children. The creative work will be donated by TBWA/Chiat/Day, New York, part of the TBWA Worldwide unit of the Omnicom Group.
